snippet.title: Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure Remastered Edition - PC Gameplay
snippet.description:
About The Game
Turn monster girls into your "Friends" and embark on an adventure together! This is a rogue-like game inspired by "Mystery Dungeon," where the terrain changes every time you challenge it.

Release Date:14 Mar, 2025
Developer:NEKOTOKAGE GAMES
Publisher:NEKOTOKAGE GAMES

Monster Girls and the Mysterious Adventure Remastered Steam/GOG/itch.io/Epic Games
